comments.author: Kevin BÃ¶ing
comments.body: Hey Tomas first of all great blog you have created here. Instead of reading the bytes in a loop, I would recommend setting the bytes with `bytets.set(data,0)` and to read the bytes into the data I would recommend `data.set(bytes.slice(0, data.length))`. This will increase the performance. Have you perhaps evaluated whether there is an even faster way to pass the imageData to the WebAssembly code?

answers.author: ttulka
answers.body: Thanks, Kevin, your proposal looks interesting! This is a PoC more than productive settings, so I did not consider performance so far. If you get more insight by yourself, it would be great when you share it in a further comment!
